author: costin
msg: Server side. As with the client side, most is actually cut&pasted from the apr and nio connectors, and heavily refactored.

author: costin
msg: After many iterations ( and about 2 years )... This is the common code for my version of the nio connector, will have an apr version
as well. It is completely non-blocking at core, with a separate blocking interface. ProxyAdapter is the main example, can be used
to break many of the comet limitations.
Of course, it is less stable and doesn't have most features yet of the nio/apr connectors - ssl, many setters are missing, it's

author: seelmann
msg: o Fixed UI integration tests, we need the full org.eclipse.ui.ide plugin including the Resource perspective
o Added RenameEntryDialog test for DIRSTUDIO-318
